description.en:
Hiyori, a guitarist for rock band Baby welcomes capable new bassist Mi-tan.  
  
Even though skilled, frivolous Hiyori is always getting ahead of himself causing Mi-tan to explode with a multitude of complaints! It pisses Hiyori off but the dying Baby needs the skilled bassist Mi-tan to survive. But now Mi-tan wants to quit!?  
  
A male band that started with respect for one another's skills is now drawn as a romance filled piece!

biography.en:
Alternative names: 135 Special (NOBARA Aiko), 135special (のばらあいこ), Aiko Nobara, Нобара Айко, 野薔薇愛子

Circle(s): 135special
Prefered Kanji: 野薔薇愛子

Has been friends with Fujiwara Beni for over 20 years.

She likes Kishimen, Chikyuu Boueigun 2 and the 90s. She says that she lacks physical strength and planning ability.

Source: [MangaUpdates](https://www.mangaupdates.com/authors.html?id=14711)
